answers.answer: You could ask for Kapake (pain killer) and motifen these are anti inflam but give a birst and then slow release for 12 hrs...xx

question: i am 23 years old and have polycystic ovarian syndrome, endometrosis, and pancreatitis.  i am constantly in pain. my whole body hurts, but its mostly in the pelvic and hip area.  i have got to where even when i go to sit down my hips pop.  also i'm being checked for hypothyroidism and diabetes.  i am having to take 2-400 mg ibprofens every 2-3 hours.  is there something else i can ask for pain?  the ibprofens arent working and i'm afraid i'm taking too many of them.
title: Lots of pain everywhere
